title: Announcement Regarding Diversity
desc: On behalf of the Kappa Delta chapter, former Regent Jordan Fuller speaks about the importance of diversity and inclusion to the organization. Discrimination and hate speech should never be tolerated.
subtitle: a message from the regent

title: Alumnus Spotlight: Katrina Lastra
desc: I make bad puns and then laugh at myself almost always, says Katrina. Hear from Cornell Theta Tau's alumnus and previous Vice Regent about her experience at Cornell and in Theta Tau.
subtitle: brother spotlight

title: Alumnus Spotlight: Andrea Clinch
desc: What is it like choosing between engineering and premed? Andrea, a Cornell Theta Tau alumnus and previous Regent, talks about what it was like to balance two demanding academic/professional schedules.
subtitle: brother spotlight
